name: tpatem
description: Touch Portal Plugin to control the ATEM mini switcher

scripts.build-win: pkg --targets node12-win-x64 . && move tpatem.exe base/win/TPAtem/ && del Installers\TPAtem-Win.tpp && cd base\win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPAtem-Win.tpp TPAtem
scripts.build-mac: pkg --targets node12-macos-x64 . && move tpatem base/mac/TPAtem/ && del Installers\TPAtem-Mac.tpp && cd base\mac && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPAtem-Mac.tpp TPAtem

author: Mike Fair <br8kpoint@gmail.com>
